name: Massive Entertainment Platform
description:
MASSIVE ENTERTAINMENT PLATFORM

- Massive Entertainment Platform is a game made in a few days for a local game jam -

Go get some well deserved entertainment

Are you feeling bored ?  Do you want to have some quick and easy fun ? Say no more. MASSIVE ENTERTAINMENT PLATFORM IS WHAT YOU NEED !

Minutes Hours Weeks Years Centuries of fun awaits you here !

CREDITS

Thomas Lebrun (Raivk) : Game Design / Code / Graphics & Such /  Some Sounds / Playing annoying instruments while making the game

Aurélien Feret (Bloadrick) : Game Design / Code / Some Sounds / Singing really loud while making the game

GAME MADE WITH A LOT OF LOVE, JUST FOR YOU TO ENJOY !
